author: Allison P. Davis
title: Hollywood’s Hottest Long-Haired Men
text:
View Slideshow "Yes, you may wrap yourself in my Brad Pitt long hair." Photo: Getty Images
Cary Fukunaga , Fabio, Rick James, Chris Hemsworth , Harry Styles: just a few of the proud members of the community of long-hairs , by virtue of their flowing, bouncing, shiny, soft, sexy locks. (I'm sorry, James Van Der Beek , you are on the wait list.) They have been blessed with the hair of heroes, hair so lustrous and thick, so hypnotic and arousing that it causes us to fall to our knees and demand of the heavens how such mortals can exist, while fantasizing of the day when we might rub fistfuls of the stuff against our faces or perhaps just snip a tiny tendril for our keepsake boxes.
But to snip would mar their beauty, to sniff would be too weird (plus, they have bodyguards), so instead we shall gaze upon a slideshow of the descendants of Samson, filled with appropriate reverence, awe, and lust — and a little side-eye for some long-hairs that should have hit the scissors before their look was captured on camera.
